ch0128_00_mitsuru/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m so glad to
see you again!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m going to try my best to get stronger so that
I won’t lose to you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0601_0701_01_10:
Sync pairs teaming up and working together
make the battles on Pasio so much fun!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0601_0701_02_10:
The way Pokémon battles work here is so different
than back home. You really need to think about
battle strategy in a different way.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0601_0701_03_10:
I think spending lots of time with your partner
Pokémon and becoming close with it is the most
important part of battle strategy!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0601_0702_01_10:
I’ve been thinking about battle strategy ever since
I arrived on Pasio.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0601_0702_02_10:
I find myself thinking about it as soon as I wake
up all the way until bedtime. It’s so much fun!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0602_0701_01_10:
Pokémon have a mysterious kind of power, don’t
you think?
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0602_0701_02_10:
Just being around them makes me feel energetic
and brave...
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0602_0701_03_10:
When I was younger, I wasn’t able to get outside
much... Spending time with Pokémon helped me
get better.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0602_0701_04_10:
When I’m with Pokémon, I feel like I can take on
anything that comes my way!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0602_0702_01_10: Pokémon have always been there for me...
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0602_0702_02_10:
I feel really fortunate to have that kind of support.
I don’t know if other people are that lucky.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0602_0702_03_10:
That’s why I can’t forget how much I owe to
Pokémon, no matter what.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0603_0701_01_10: There’s a certain Trainer I’m trying to beat.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0603_0701_02_10:
I’ve battled them a number of times and always
given it my best. But no matter what, it seems like
they’re always a few steps ahead of me...
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0603_0701_03_10:
Someday I’m going to catch up to them. I want
to win our next battle.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0603_0701_04_10: That’s a really big dream of mine!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0603_0702_01_10:
There are some things you can learn only by
losing Pokémon battles.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0603_0702_02_10:
That’s why every battle is a good learning
experience, no matter how it ends!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0604_0701_01_10:
People who plan careful battle strategies, people
who live in the moment and battle off the cuff...
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0604_0701_02_10: There’s all kinds of Trainers out there.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0604_0701_03_10:
I’m the kind of Trainer who likes to plan my
strategy before a battle.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0604_0701_04_10:
But when it’s time for the real thing, I can get
caught up in the battle and forget my strategy...
I don’t think that’s a bad thing, though.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0604_0702_01_10:
Planning the strategies and options to use in battle
is a lot of fun!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0604_0702_02_10:
But in an actual battle, a lot of things can happen
that you didn’t account for in your plan. Things
can turn bad pretty quick.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0604_0702_03_10:
So it feels really great when a battle goes the
way you planned!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0605_0701_02_10:
Hmm... What would you define our relationship
as, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0605_0701_03_10:
I’ve been thinking on it for a while, and I can’t
seem to find the answer.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0605_0701_05_10:
Ah, never mind! S-sorry! It was nothing! Please
forget about it!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0605_0702_01_10:
Whatever we are, you’re important to me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0128_00_mitsuru/0605_0702_02_10:
That’s why, um...I hope we can accomplish more
in the future together!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/1701_0701_02_10:
I wanted to give you this. I’m sure it’ll be useful
to you!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/1701_0702_01_10: I recently read a book about useful items.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/1701_0702_02_10:
If I find another helpful item, I’ll be sure to give it
to you!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/2501_0701_01_10:
I think what’s fun about Pokémon battles is that
I get to grow stronger alongside my Pokémon.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/2501_0701_02_10:
And it’s not just my strength—it’s my strength and
my Pokémon’s strength together.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/2501_0701_03_10: That’s what makes winning feel so good...
ch0128_00_mitsuru/2501_0701_04_10:
Sharing that joy of victory with Pokémon helps me
become even better friends with them!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/2501_0702_01_10:
A Trainer striving for victory for their
Pokémon, and a Pokémon striving for
victory for its Trainer...
ch0128_00_mitsuru/2501_0702_02_10:
When our feelings are unified like that, it doesn’t
matter what sync pair we face. I know we’ll be
all right!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/2511_0701_01_10: I’ve grown from my time in Hoenn.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/2511_0701_02_10:
My Pokémon and I have gotten stronger together
on our adventures. We’ve experienced so much...
ch0128_00_mitsuru/2511_0701_03_10:
I wouldn’t trade that time for anything... I’ll
always, always treasure it!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/2511_0701_05_10:
is to make lots of memories here on Pasio and to
grow even more as a Trainer!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/2511_0702_01_10:
And I want to make lots of new memories with
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/2511_0702_02_10:
Adventuring together on the same team, battling
each other as rivals...
ch0128_00_mitsuru/2511_0702_03_10:
With you and my partner Pokémon with me,
I’m sure I’ll make lots of wonderful memories.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/3001_0701_01_10:
Oh, um, h-hello! What a nice morning, huh?
The air is so clean and fresh today.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/3002_0701_01_10:
Um, h-hi! I was just about to go do some training.
Let’s both do our best today, OK?
ch0128_00_mitsuru/3003_0701_01_10:
W-we should try planning our day ahead of time.
That way, we can make every second count!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/3004_0701_01_10:
Training with my Pokémon is fun and all...
but it usually just makes me want to battle!
ch0128_00_mitsuru/3005_0701_01_10:
I can’t believe it’s already this late! Time really
flies when you’re having fun with your Pokémon.
ch0128_00_mitsuru/3006_0701_01_10:
Um, I-I think I still have some energy left today.
I could probably do some more training if I
wanted... But should I?
